text: hum to Allah ta’ala par badi jhooti tuhmath lagaane waale ho jayenge agar hum tumhaare deen mein aa jaaye us ke baadh ke Allah ta’ala ne hum ko us se najaath di, aur hum se mumkin nahi ke tumhaare maz-hab mein phir aa jaaye, lekin haan ye ke Allah hee ne jo hamaara maalik hai muqaddar kiya ho, hamaare rab ka ilm har cheez ko moheeth hai, hum Allah hee par bharosa rakhte hai, aye hamaare parvardigaar! hamaare aur hamaari khaum ke darmiyaan haq ke mawaafiq faisla kar de aur tu sab se accha faisla karne waala hai
